articles.description: Darwin Nunez had six shots against Everton and created two further chances, but was otherwise on the periphery of the Merseyside derby
articles.content: Few big money signings have had as eventful a start as Darwin Nunez has experienced at Liverpool. Despite not being injured, it took until the seventh match of the season for him to play for more tha… [+3749 chars]

articles.author: Oli Gamp
articles.title: Manchester United: Jamie Carragher insists Lisandro Martinez is too small despite good form - Daily Mail
articles.description: Martinez's return to form was brought up by Gary Neville on The Overlap, co-hosted by his fellow pundit Carragher, who insists he would be reluctant to play against someone of his height.
articles.content:
Jamie Carragher remains unconvinced by Man United defender Lisandro Martinez - claiming he would not want a 5ft 9in defender on his team.
The Argentine centre-back joined Old Trafford in a £55millio… [+4942 chars]

articles.author: Charlotte Daly
articles.title: 'This must be a joke': Antony on '£20m bonus row' between agents after his £86m move to United - Daily Mail
articles.description: Antony completed a £85m move to United during the summer transfer window. However, several parties are trying to claim credit for orchestrating the move. Antony has now set the record straight.
articles.content:
Manchester United's new star signing Antony has hit out at the agency claiming to have played a defining role in his huge move to Old Trafford.

articles.title: Chelsea: Edouard Mendy 'REJECTS new contract because he was offered less than Kepa' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Senegalese goalkeeper is one of the lowest-paid players in the Blues squad but rejected the first proposal because the terms were inferior to his understudy Kepa, who is on £190,000 a week.
articles.content:
